column4: thanks for making this clear. i had idea that debian etch is rock stable and ubuntu maybe crash or being hacked. probably i had wrong idea
i m used at ubuntu at home (desktops). at server i have debian. i m thinking if  i must switch to ubuntu, if it will be easier to administer, and updated
i mean what is the next trustworthy server version. since you propose no 8.10, then 9.04? to prefer only LTS versions?
